settings.title: EVOQUE FINAL CLOTHING SALE
settings.content: After many wonderful years at Evoque London, we are embracing a new chapter. With Maeve now ready to step back and enjoy more time with family especially as a proud grandmother we have made the heartfelt decision to say goodbye to part of our beloved boutique. Evoque has always been the heart behind our clothing collections. As we move forward, we have decided that Evoque London will no longer carry clothing. Instead, Evoque will continue the journey, transforming the boutique into a haven for timeless handbags and elegant jewelry. This isn’t an easy transition the boutique has been our passion, our pride, and a huge part of our lives. We’ve loved every moment of creativity, connection, and laughter shared with you, our wonderful customers. As we say farewell to our clothing collections, we invite you to shop one last time during our special End of an Era Sale—your final chance to find beautiful pieces before they’re gone for good! From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for being part of our story. Though this chapter is ending, we can’t wait to welcome you into the next one. ❤️
